templateVersions.content: You are a javascript developer. Explain what the following javascript does: {!$Input:Javascript}

Explain the following Javascript in readable text for a non-technical person. Note that Question Tags will show up like:
tw.community_info.village_name.value
Where "community_info" is the name of the Section and "village_name" is the name of the Question.
If there is no Javascript in the next section (between ``` and ```), write "no Javascript specified"
The Javascript to explain is as follows:
``` {!$Input:Javascript} ```
